thread.title: Kentucky lists injury and illness updates for Florida game
thread.title_full: Kentucky lists injury and illness updates for Florida game

title: Kentucky lists injury and illness updates for Florida game
text: Manage Kentucky lists injury and illness updates for Florida game One Kentucky player is a game-time decision, another is out and another will play against Florida on Saturday. — Kentucky Basketball (@KentuckyMBB) February 5, 2017 Kentucky basketball may only be without one player as the Wildcats get ready to take on Florida in Gainesville. The official Kentucky basketball Twitter account showed video of star   warming up, listing him as a game-time decision. At the same time, the account said that Mychal Mulder would play, after making a return from an illness the senior guard was fighting. One player who will definitely miss Saturday’s game is freshman Sacha Killeya-Jones , who didn’t make the trip to Gainesville because of an illness. Author
